attributes.action: Stop people / parties that are anti EU from standing in the EU elections.
attributes.background: Being a member of the EU is a national decision, not an EU one, and as such should only be pursued in the national political arena. MEP's are there to represent the views of the electorate regarding EU legislation not that the UK should be part of the EU in the first place.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because it's not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament to ban political parties from participating in elections because of their views.
